greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Jacobi theta constant theta_2^3 /8.
comment: Number of ways of writing n as the sum of three odd positive squares.
reference: J. H. Conway and N. J. A. Sloane, "Sphere Packings, Lattices and Groups", Springer-Verlag, p. 102.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000

J. E. Jones [Lennard-Jones] and A. E. Ingham, On the calculation of certain crystal potential constants and on the cubic crystal of least potential energy, Proc. Royal Soc., A 107 (1925), 636-653 (see p. 650).
program: (Scheme) (define (A008437 n) (cond ((< n 3) 0) ((even? n) 0) (else (let loop ((k (- (A000196 n) (modulo (+ 1 (A000196 n)) 2))) (s 0)) (if (< k 1) s (loop (- k 2) (+ s (A290081 (- n (* k k)))))))))) ;; _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 24 2017
xref: Cf. A000004 (the even bisection), A000196, A290081.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
